reviewText: Overall not a bad video, but much tamer than other more recent Playboy offerings.  Tameness likely due to the fact that many scenes are "Best Ofs" that date back to the early to mid nineties.  There were a few very hot scenes--my favorite being scene #2 starring Brande Roderick.  What an angel she is!!  The camera was nice enough to give many enticing close-ups of her anatomy!!  Another outstanding scene starred Leisa Sheridan in a "home alone with her boyfriend" type of thing.  She has the cutest smile I've seen in a while, with quite the body to go along. Suzanne Stokes, Julie Cialini and Summer Altice also had super sequences. The only problem I found with this video is that since many of the girls in it are older Playmates, I did not know their names, which takes away a little bit for me.
